name: ByteDance Volcano Engine
title: 50 Trillion Token Consumer-to-Enterprise Scale

classification.classificationRationale: Volcano Engine / Doubao is an internal AI platform (built for TikTok/Douyin ecosystem) now commercialized externally to enterprise customers (Mercedes-Benz, BYD, China Merchants Bank). This internal-to-external platform trajectory is the defining pattern of Model 5c. Ocean team hardware initiatives (Doubao phone, Ola Friend, AI glasses) further extend the platform into products. Structural orientation: Volcano Engine is a named, separately-branded business unit.

description:
ByteDance's Doubao large language model usage grew more than tenfold in a single year. 'AI is being adopted at an unprecedented speed, and how to make better use of it has become a question all businesses have to answer well.'
- Doubao's daily token usage: 50 trillion tokens/month, up from 4 trillion (12x increase in one year)
- Volcano Engine accounts for 49.2% of AI model-focused public cloud services in China (IDC)
- Enterprise customers: Mercedes-Benz, BYD, China Merchants Bank, Yuanfudao
- Spring Festival Gala partnership (2026 CCTV): reached 700+ million viewers
- Ocean team integrates hardware initiatives: Doubao phone, Ola Friend earbuds, AI glasses, plus acquired Smartisan, PICO, Oladance

observableMarkers.metrics: 172M MAUs (QuestMobile Q3 2025), surpassing DeepSeek's 144M. $23B AI infrastructure investment planned for 2026. Potential 20,000 NVIDIA H200 chip purchase.

layers.label: Curation Review
layers.summary: Model 5c (Platform-to-Product) validated. Volcano Engine / Doubao is a classic internal-platform-turned-external-product: built for TikTok/Douyin, now sold to Mercedes-Benz, BYD, China Merchants Bank. Structural orientation confirmed: Volcano Engine is a named, separately-branded business unit. Added habitat data and sector.

layers.label: Initial Documentation
layers.summary: ByteDance's Doubao large language model usage grew more than tenfold in a single year. 'AI is being adopted at an unprecedented speed, and how to make better use of it has become a question all businesses have to answer well.'

tensionPositions.speedVsDepth: Speed. 12x token growth in one year, rapid hardware portfolio expansion (phone, earbuds, glasses).
tensionPositions.centralVsDistributed: Centralized. Volcano Engine is a central platform serving both internal (TikTok) and external customers.
